text: "To Cut a Long Story Short" is a 1980 debut single from English new wave band Spandau Ballet. It was taken from their debut studio album Journeys to Glory. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 9 in Ireland, number 15 in Australia, number 19 in Spain and number 38 in New Zealand. ==Formats and track listings== *7-inch single # "To Cut a Long Story Short" — 3:20 # "To Cut a Long Story Short" ("Version" version [dub mix]) — 3:20 *12-inch single # "To Cut a Long Story Short" (Mix 1) — 6:30 # "To Cut a Long Story Short" (Mix 2) ("Version" version [dub mix]) — 3:56 ==References== Category:1980 songs Category:Spandau Ballet songs Category:Art pop songs Category:Synth-pop songs
